newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistani stocks rise at noon on settlement day.
newsitem.headline: Pakistani stocks rise at noon on settlement day.

text.p: Pakistani stocks rose at noon on Tuesday as blue chip buying by foreign funds and local investors offset the position-squaring on settlement day, dealers said.
"Sentiment is positive and despite squaring of positions on the last day of clearing, the index has gained as actively traded blue chips continued their rally."
The index rose 30 points, or 1.48 percent, to end at 2,055.41. Gainers beat losers 118 to 44. Hub Power rose 2.20 rupees to 60.30 and Pakistan State Oil 7.0 to 441.
